items.title: Grifin secures $11M to make investing less intimidating for its female user base
items.description: Investment app Grifin secured a $11 million Series A funding round.

items.title: Trump set to delay TikTok ban with yet another extension
items.description: U.S. President Donald Trump will issue another extension to decide the fate of TikTok, pushing it by 90 days, the White House said on Tuesday.

items.title: 4 Best Smart Glasses (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: This burgeoning wearable tech category lets you dabble in augmented reality, virtual screens, and AI assistants right on your face.

items.title: Silk & Snow S&S Organic Mattress Review: Soft as a Cloud
items.description: Silk & Snow’s got an organic mattress in its lineup, and it’s amazingly comfortable—but only for solo sleepers.

items.title: Pope Leo makes AI’s threat to humanity a signature issue
items.description: Pope Leo XIV, the new American pope, is making the threat of AI to humanity a key issue of his legacy.
